subject: Baseball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Florida International’s Garrett Wittels extended his hitting streak to 54 games and will take his pursuit of Robin Ventura’s Division I record to the N.C.A.A.  tournament.
snippet: Florida International’s Garrett Wittels extended his hitting streak to 54 games and will take his pursuit of Robin Ventura’s Division I record to the N.C.A.A.  tournament.
